channel.title: CVE Feed for HCL Software -- HCL BigFix Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for HCL Software -- HCL BigFix Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-37519|2024-08-02T17:16:30.159Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20platform
item.description: Unauthenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability. This XSS vulnerability is in the Download Status Report, which is served by the BigFix Server.

item.title: CVE-2023-37520|2024-08-02T17:16:30.415Z -- hcl%20software -- hcl%20bigfix%20platform
item.description: Unauthenticated Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability identified in BigFix Server version 9.5.12.68, allowing for potential data exfiltration. This XSS vulnerability is in the Gather Status Report, which is served by the BigFix Relay.
